meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Diane Davis Andy Zax Cigus Vanni Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1004.

td.p: Diane Davis, a patient account representative from Alhambra, California
Andy Zax, a graduate student from Los Angeles, California
Cigus Vanni, a psychologist from Bala Cynwyd, Pennsylvania (whose 4-day cash winnings total $32,400)

tr.td: HOLIDAYS & OBSERVANCES
BUSINESS BIGGIES
NOTORIOUS
SPORTS TRIVIA
FOREIGN WORDS
THE ARTIST OF RECORD

Diane

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
